Articles.Content:
Is anyone else having problems with their flags vanishing... not just from the map screen or the control center screen, but physically vanishing from the game.

Edited December 23, 2013 by DerekL1963
I have also had this happen (my Minmus flag disappeared) I believe this is a minor bug. What mods do you have installed, if any?

It's looking like it was a PEBKAC for me... based on the screenshots I'd posted in a Facebook group (celebrating my first landing) someone thought I was putting the flags too close to my lander and knocking them over on ascent. Placed the next one further away, and it's still there.

I've had issues in certain locations (IE this one particular crater on Mun) where flags would explode on load/unload, 4 times in different spots (though all within 200m of my lander). Some spots are just buggy. Other places I could drop the flag 10m away and have no problem.
A couple of mine have vanished, but most of them didn't. It seems to be a rare and random glitch.
So far, it's two placed close and vanished, three placed far and still intact... I'm gonna call this one answered.
